content:
Some of the trending Latin Asian fusion chefs on social media right now include:

1. Roy Choi (@ridingshotgunla) - a Korean-American chef who blends Korean and Mexican flavors in his cooking.
2. Eduardo Ruiz (@edwardruizchef) - a chef who combines Mexican and Japanese flavors in his cooking.
3. Sheldon Simeon (@simeonsheldon) - a chef who infuses his Hawaiian heritage with Filipino and other Asian flavors.
4. Pati Jinich (@patijinich) - a chef who specializes in Mexican cuisine but also experiments with other international flavors, including Asian.
5. Jesus Lorenzo (@laotracomediamx) - a chef who combines traditional Mexican dishes with Asian flavors.
6. Tatsu Aikawa (@tatsuaikawa) - a chef who incorporates Mexican flavors into his Japanese cuisine.
7. Maricela Vega (@chefsouschef) - a chef who blends Southern and Mexican flavors with Korean and other Asian influences.

These chefs and many others like them are using social media to showcase their unique fusion creations and to inspire others to experiment with different flavor combinations in their cooking.
